name: Ghost Island-2D Adventure mini game
description:
Hi Guys this free to play 2D offline single player adventure game consists of 4 levels with intuitive controls and simple gameplay mechanics. This game has 4 levels with the 4th one being the hardest. This app contains no ads and it is meant to be a pet project for me!

I would love to have your feedback and if you want me to add anything to this game! 

Thanks and hopefully you guys enjoy the game :)

Sprites Credit:
Please contact for sprites credit. I found the sprites on Unity store for free many years ago and had the files saved. I don't have access to that project anymore nor I could find your listing again.
Sound Credits:

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
